Name: Crack the Case
Text: Quest: Have friendly minions attack 12 times.

Name: Dust for Prints
Text: Quest: Add 20 cards to your hand.

Name: Find the Murder Weapon
Text: Quest: Increase a friendly minion's stats 14 times.

Name: Hire an Investigator
Text: Quest: End your turn with unspent Gold 3 times.

Name: Pressure the Authorities
Text: Quest: Get your warband to 35 total Attack.

Name: Sort It All Out
Text: Quest: Order your minions from lowest to highest Attack for 4 combats.

Name: Track the Footprints
Text: Quest: Have Bob's Tavern Refreshed 9 times.

Name: Unlikely Duo
Text: Quest: Play 5 minions from [either of two randomly selected types].

Name: Witness Protection
Text: Quest: Have a friendly Taunt minion attacked 6 times.
